body_html: I see. I've gotten random/incorrect results from GPU when I compiled with the wrong Compute Capability. The description says it's for CUDA 8.0, but there are were no official releases for CUDA 8.0 in September. So maybe there's been a user mistake in ./configure step. A way to rule that out is to reproduce with the official wheel
